short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate taxi fares in London By WestwayRide

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily calculate your London taxi fare with the London Taxi Fare Calculator Chrome extension! Whether you're a local or a visitor, this handy tool allows you to estimate the cost of your taxi ride in the bustling city of London.

Key Features:

Accurate Fare Estimates: Get instant and accurate fare estimates based on the distance and time of day, helping you plan your budget for taxi rides across London.

Real-Time Updates: The extension uses real-time data to provide up-to-date fare information, ensuring that you have the most current pricing details for your journey.

User-Friendly Interface: The simple and intuitive interface makes it easy for users of all levels to input their starting and ending locations, enabling quick and efficient fare calculations.

Customizable Options: Tailor the fare estimate to your specific requirements by adjusting settings such as pickup/drop-off locations and choosing between standard or premium taxi services.

Convenient Access: Access the London Taxi Fare Calculator directly from your Chrome browser, eliminating the need for separate apps or websites. Enjoy the convenience of planning your taxi expenses with just a few clicks.

Local Currency Support: The extension supports multiple currencies, ensuring that you receive fare estimates in your preferred currency for a hassle-free experience.
